channel.title: Someone Please Help ME! I Can't get My sources to work!
channel.description: Hey guys, I'm having a lot of problems right now trying to make my own server, and I would really like to know if there is any very good coders that'll be able to help me, and if so if you have like MSN or something we could talk for a little bit, it'll be very helpfull, if you want to help post it and tell me your MSN and go on, and I can make you Co-Owner of the server.. I've got a lot done already, I just a few questions to get it started, it's not loading right.. that's all I need. Please someone help me..

item.title: Someone Please Help ME! I Can't get My sources to work!
item.dc:creator: @jagex4lmo jagex4lmo
item.description:
@jagex4lmo wrote:

Yes, thanks i just figured that out, it says it cant find the path specified, so if someone can let me know how i can fix this i would be much appreciated, this is the class path i have now: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

And this is the Path i have now: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;

The classpath and path i used to have were much different, yet still worked to play on servers,

Classpath:.;CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;%CLASSPATH%;C:\Program Files
(x86)\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

Path:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin;C:\Program Files (x86)\QuickTime\QTSystem\

Read full topic
item.source: Someone Please Help ME! I Can't get My sources to work!

item.title: Someone Please Help ME! I Can't get My sources to work!
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

jagex4lmo:

oh well thanks anyway man. I appreciate it, and if anyone else reads this, i think it has to do with the porforwarding because i can’t get onto the server.

Even if you portforwarded your port incorrectly, you are able to get onto your server. That’s all I can say.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone Please Help ME! I Can't get My sources to work!
item.dc:creator: @jagex4lmo jagex4lmo
item.description:
@jagex4lmo wrote:

Well I can’t get it online, i’m doing the basic No-ip.org server… but everytime I click ‘run’ on the source i downloaded, it will either not load, or say can’t find the path, although i have found it, or if i get a knew source it’ll open, but there’s an error connecting to server, I have a feeling it’s either my paths, although i know i did those pretty well, or it’s my portforwarding, but i believe it’s set up right…

Read full topic
